//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "ARM1" );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/misc/events/intercom_buzz.mp3" );
	wait ( 3000.000 );

	task ( "closed" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/gladstone/arm1/01closed.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "ARM1_001" );
	}

	dowait ( "closed" );
	wait ( 500.000 );
	use ( "turnon_intercom2" );
}
